alert.note: Alert for Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 7:40PM CDT until June 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cow Creek near Hutchinson affecting Rice and Reno Counties. For the Cow Creek...including Lyons, Hutchinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cow Creek near Hutchinson. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Fields and cropland along the creek floods. Sections of Sallee Rd floods between 82nd Ave to 108th Ave. Also 95th Ave floods between Dean and Sallee Roads. Expect road closures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Cow Creek Hutchinso 9.5 8.7 Wed 7 pm CDT 9.3 9.2 5.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
